item.title: [Release] Zoom
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

Now we just need to reduce the fog of war so more area is visible.

For those that don’t know what I mean…

By extension, “Fog of War” is also used to describe the limited view distance of many first person shooters, where unlimited view is considered either bad for gameplay or, more often, because of technical limitations, in that a Fog of War allows for the rendering of a smaller part of the game area.
Its the black area outside of visible

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Zoom
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Had someone PMing me about this, when it’s quite self explanatory when it was released with NOOBscape v1 that I did.

Open the Mudclient.java, and search for:

protected final void handleMenuKeyDown(int key) {

Under that in the cases, add:

    		case 1002: // Page Up
			if(cameraHeight < 300){
			cameraHeight += 25;
			}else{
    			cameraHeight -= 25;
			//displayMessage("@gr2@Zoom: @whi@" + cameraHeight + ".", 3, 0);
			}
    			break;
    		case 1003: // Page Down
    			if(cameraHeight > 1500){
			cameraHeight -= 25;
			}else{
    			cameraHeight += 25;
			//displayMessage("@gr2@Zoom: @whi@" + cameraHeight + ".", 3, 0);
			}
    			break;

If you want to assign it to a different key, change the case. That is setting it for the Page Up button to zoom it in and the Page Down button to zoom it out.

Read full topic
